content: CPF Asked by Christopher HowAsked on 14 Aug 2019What private annuity insurance plans will allow me to opt out from CPF Life?Can CPF Board advise what are the private annuity insurance plans that CPF members can purchase, in order to opt out from CPF Life? It seems like the clauses set by CPF Board disqualifies all private annuity insurance plans that are currently available in the market.1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Luke Ho, Kick-Ass Financial Services Consultant at Trillion Financial PlannersLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Sep 2019Only private annuities that can prove lifetime payouts e.g. annuities till 80 will not cut it can POSSIBLY allow you to opt-out.0 comments0
